fields.text: Welcome to Credit Karma in San Francisco, your partner in personal finance and credit monitoring.
Press [INDEX] for credit score and account management.
Press [INDEX] for your credit score and report.
Please hold while we connect you to a credit score specialist.
Press [INDEX] for account settings and security.
Please hold while we connect you with an account security representative.
Press [INDEX] for loan services and credit offers.
Press [INDEX] to explore personal loan options.
Please hold while we connect you with a loan specialist.
Press [INDEX] to inquire about credit card offers.
Please hold while we connect you with a credit card specialist.
